summary: An email from July 7, 2020, providing background information on financial and social connections related to Jeffrey Epstein. The sender shares knowledge about Tony Blair's private banker at Deutsche Bank (also linked to Epstein), Steve Bing's connection to Epstein, and Liz Hurley's alleged affair with Bill Clinton and payments. The sender mentions their own unrelated traumatic experience and suggests these details may help piece together larger patterns.

persons.name: Tony Blair
persons.context: Mentioned as having a former private banker at Deutsche Bank, the same bank referenced in connection with Epstein's money payments.

persons.name: Steve Bing
persons.context: Described as knowing Epstein, with a photo of them together. The sender worked for a company Bing owned in the 90s and states Bing was 'Not a nice guy'.

persons.name: Liz Hurley
persons.context: Mentioned as having had an affair with Bill Clinton for 8 months and receiving payments from him. Her accountant in the 90s was Nigel Clay and Associates.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: Alleged to have had an 8-month affair with Liz Hurley and made payments to her. Mentioned in the context of potentially helping piece together larger patterns.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the email; referenced in connection with Deutsche Bank fines and his association with Steve Bing.

persons.name: Nigel Clay
persons.context: Named as the accountant for Liz Hurley in London in the 90s, through his firm Nigel Clay and Associates, which was also the sender's accountant.

connections.description: Tony Blair's former private banker was at Deutsche Bank, according to the email.
Deutsche Bank is referenced in conjunction with Epstein and money payments, per a CNN article cited.
The email states Steve Bing knew Epstein and there is a photo of them together.
Alleged to have had a willing affair for 8 months, with Clinton making payments to Hurley.
Nigel Clay and Associates was Hurley's accountant in London in the 90s, handling payments she received.
The sender worked for a company in LA owned by Steve Bing in the 90s.
The sender's accountant in London in the 90s was Nigel Clay and Associates.

events.title: CNN reports on Deutsche Bank fine related to Epstein
events.description: CNN publishes an article about Deutsche Bank being fined in connection with Jeffrey Epstein and money payments.

events.title: Liz Hurley's payments and accounting
events.description: In the 1990s, Liz Hurley allegedly received payments of $100,000 from several sources, with Nigel Clay and Associates as her accountant in London.

events.title: Sender's employment with Steve Bing's company
events.description: The sender worked for a company in Los Angeles owned by Steve Bing during the 1990s.

events.title: Alleged Clinton-Hurley affair
events.description: Liz Hurley allegedly had an 8-month affair with Bill Clinton and received payments from him, as learned by the sender in recent years.

keyFacts: Tony Blair's former private banker was at Deutsche Bank, the same bank fined for its dealings with Jeffrey Epstein.
Steve Bing, a film producer, knew Jeffrey Epstein and there is a photo of them together.
Liz Hurley allegedly had an 8-month affair with Bill Clinton and received payments from him, with her accounting handled by Nigel Clay and Associates in London in the 1990s.
The sender claims to have experienced traumatic events separate from these circles but suggests these details may help piece together larger patterns for justice.
The email is dated July 7, 2020, and references a CNN article from that day about Deutsche Bank's fines related to Epstein.
